title: Spacious 3BR/1.5BA Home in a Garden-Like Community!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Blossom Hill Apartments!', 'Large 3 Bed 1.5 Bath  3 \xa0bed / 1.5 bath / 1235 Sq.', 'Ft / $3,515', '* Unit 5430 - Available', 'Now', 'Blossom Hill Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '5480 Lean Ave San Jose, CA 95123', '*Pricing is subject to change daily - price quotes are valid for 72 hours*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x481', 'Property Description', 'Blossom Hill Apartments is a lushly landscaped community featuring a sparkling swimming pool, state of the art fitness center, large recreation room with a full kitchen, a BBQ picnic area and multiple play areas.', 'Blossom Hill also features large floor plans and convenience to shopping center, restaurants, freeways and public transportation.', 'Spacious grounds and winding walkways run throughout the property with courtyard benches along the way.', 'Come visit Blossom Hill Apartments and see for yourself why we are the best in affordability and comfort in San Jose.', 'Property Amenities', '* Fitness Center', '* Playgrounds', '* Swimming Pool', '* Barbeque Areas', '* Courtesy Patrol', '*', 'After School Program', '* Laundry Facilities', '* Assigned Parking', 'Parking:', 'Please contact the office for parking details.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs are allowed.', 'Breed restrictions and weight restriction may apply.', 'Please contact our office for the pet policies.', 'Units:', '201', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Tuesday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Wednesday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Thursday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Friday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Saturday', ':\xa0\xa0 9:00am to 4:30pm', 'Management Company:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x481', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
